direction.raw_text: Oh yes. BACK ON FURIOUS, RAJA, and SHOVELER - FURIOUS No he hasn't. EXT.  FRANKENSTEIN MANSION - NIGHT - ANGLE ON the wall of the estate... as our heroes' three heads rise up over it... and survey the grounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait!... Look! THEIR POV - A group of men are hanging around the door to the house, smoking, chatting, and laughing.  A CLOSER ANGLE REVEALS that they are all dressed in the height (or depths) of seventies disco fashion.  One of them is showing off some steps. Our heroes fall back behind the safety of the wall and confer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is bad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are they?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Disco Boys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The most vicious gang of thugs this city ever produced.  Twenty years ago they were Casanova's personal bodyguard.  But after he was busted they crawled into the woodwork.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well they've crawled back out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We may be getting in over our heads here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This looks like a job for Superman--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or Batman--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or both.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you guys get it?  If Captain Amazing is still in there, we can rescue him--and get on TV! (goes right over the wall) They share an exasperated look, then scramble over the wall after him. INT.  CASANOVA'S BEDROOM - CONTINUOUS Casanova and Dr. Anabel Leek are preparing for bed.  Anabel sits in front of a huge mirror, brushing her long hair as Casanova moves up behind her and puts his hands around her throat, massaging, squeezing, just barely resisting the temptation to strangle her.  (She loves it).
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything's going exactly as we planned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not quite.  You haven't announced our engagement yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It must have slipped my mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your mind is so slippery.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, Pootchkie.  My womanizing days are over.  You're my Lady Macbeth, my Imelda... my Nicole. (pulls her into his arms) We're such an incredible team.  Who could possibly stop us? (kisses her) CUT RIGHT TO: EXT.  THE LAWN - CONTINUOUS - ON OUR THREE HEROES as they crunch their way non too stealthily across the backyard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't crunch the leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be a Mohican. (bumps into a lawn chair)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait. (They all stop.) I hear something. They all listen; there is a low rushing sound... It is the sound of water rushing through pipes.  Suddenly, the lawn sprinklers all pop up... and our heroes get drenched.  They duck off the lawn, behind the cover of a large tree.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm soaked. (sneezes) Oh great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shhh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be a Mohican. RAJA Shut up. Furious sees a pair of French doors, off a small patio.  One of the doors is slightiy open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. They start sneaking toward it, but as they cross the patio... they trip the automatic security lighting, and suddenly find themselves bathed in light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-oh. As our heroes look around as a dozen Disco Boys, armed with pipes, chains, brass knuckles, step into the light and encircle them... The French doors open and Tony P steps out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh I'm sorry.  We must have the wrong house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You sure do. The Disco Boys attack.  The Raja is instantly clubbed down. The Shoveler deflects only a blow or two with his shovel before he goes down, too... These guys are not the Red Eyes. Only Furious holds his own.  He grabs a pipe away from one of them and swings fiercely, keeping the others off.  Suddenly, the Disco Boys pull back.  Furious doesn't know why, until he turns and sees... Casanova, standing right behind him, smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi there. With a cat-like move Casanova slashes his gold chain viciously--and repeatedly--across Furious' face.  Furious, stunned with pain, lunges at Casanova, who neatly steps aside, then catches him with a fast combination of spinning disco kicks.  Finally he lassos the chain around Furious' neck, and pulls it tight, strangling him. ON THE DISCO BOYS, watching, snapping their fingers with admiration... Casanova releases Furious, who slumps to the ground.  Casanova steps away, and the Disco Boys gather around Furious and kick him viciously... as Casanova and Tony P watch, amused, chuckling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Superheroes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Should I kill them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why bother? EXT.  JUST OUTSIDE THE MANSION - A MOMENT LATER The Disco Boys drag our heroes through the gate and throw them like bags of garbage into the street... where thay lie in a moaning, agonized, semi-conscious heap. INT.  THE DINER - LATER - CLOSE ON Furious, rubbing his neck; a thin red mark runs around it. The three of them are sitting at their usual table, in very bad shape, moaning and groaning... Monica approaches.  She's made them ice packs and cold compresses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here you go. (sits with them, applies a compress to the Raja's head)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe you guys ought to forget this Superhero stuff and join Kiwanis or something. A FUSSY CUSTOMER is calling out from another table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miss! She moves off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe she's right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you serious? This is the break we've been waiting for!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What have the famous superheroes got that we don't?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agents?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Archenemies!  Casanova isn't just a criminal-- he's a supervillain. Stopping him could be our ticket to fame, fortune--and babes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And it would be the right thing to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah yeah--and that, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But there's only three of us, and he's got the entire brotherhood of evil at his disposal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then maybe it's time for us to form our own brotherhood... (more)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a brotherhood of righteous, crime fighting, skull cracking, Disco Boy bashing, warriors of the night!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm liking this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I say we send out the word--and summon all of the unsung superheroes we know!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, but... who do we know? They take a long moment to ponder this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... there's the Spleen. Shoveler and Raja make disgusted noises.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do we have to?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got this cousin.  He's a real doofus, but he claims he can become invisible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you ever seen him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How could I see him if he's invisible?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good point.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And there's the Sphinx.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's a legendary masked Mexican crime fighting superwrestler and master of the machete.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sounds good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one's sure that he actually exists, but they say he can be contacted by leaving a message on a crumpled up napkin at the Tacky Taco down by the bus station.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get outta here. EXT.  TACKY TACO - DAY - ESTABLISHING A funky Mexican restaurant by the bus station. INT.  THE RESTAURANT - CONTINUOUS Our heroes, in normal clothing, have just finished a taco lunch. Furious is writing a mssage on a napkin with a ballpoint pen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You sure that's how you spell it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. CLOSE ON THE NOTE - which reads "Spinks, we need you." They crumple up the napkin and leave the restaurant... A moment later a shy looking MEXICAN MAN busses their tray... but in A CLOSE ANGLE we see him secretly pocket the napkin. EXT. HOUSE - DAY - ESTABLISHING A little brick house. INT.  INVISIBLE BOY'S ROOM - DAY A teenage boy's room, decorated to the max with models and posters of the great superheroes: Batman, Spiderman, Captain Amazing, etc. INVISIBLE BOY, about fifteen, is being interviewed by the Raja, Mister Furious, and the Shoveler.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, let me get this straight.  You have the power to become invisible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But... only when no one is looking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If someone looks at you, you immediately become visible again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you're only invisible... to yourself?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I look at myseif, I become visible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you're only invisible, when abuolutely no one is looking at you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So how do you know that you've ever been invisible?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just know. Our heroes are less than impressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, kid, we've got a lot of heroes to interview--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know I haven't got it entirely worked out yet, but I've always dreamed of becoming a superhero... Weren't you guys ever a kid? Didn't you ever need someone to just give you a chance? ON OUR HEROES, looking around the room... and softening up. INT.  THE DINER - NIGHT Our heroes sit at their usual table along with Invisible Boy and a weird looking guy in a greasy, stained yellow superhero outfit.  Across his chest in falling off stick on letters it reads "THE SPLEEN", and that's exactly who he is.  Furious, the Raja, and Shoveler sit as far away from him as possible. He is a totally noxious, hyperactive person... and he is thrilled to be there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boy I can't tell you how thrilled I was when you guys called--You gonna eat that pickle? (sucks it in) I've always dreamed of being a member of the a real superhero team--and to have friends--real friends--I mean guys I could live with--sleep with--die with--eat with... He puts the mustard dispenser to his lips and squeezes it straight into his mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love mustard. Furious, Raja, and the Shoveler react; they can't believe they've actually invited this guy to join their group.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what exactly is your superpower?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, when I was a kid I grew up on Love Canal- -remember that?--and my brothers and I used to go swimming in it--make Kool-Aid out of it-- stuff like that.  Anyway my brothers all died, but I lived, and I grew all these like weird organs that have never been seen in humans before.  So now I can do things like this! He leans over the table and lets just a little tiny drop of spittle dribble onto the table... CLOSE ON THE TABLE - as the spittle burns a hole in the Formica.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cool, huh? The Spleen inadvertently gives the tiniest little burp, and our three heroes duck out of the way or under the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watch it!... Look out!... Whoa! The people in the next booth give a cry of revulsion, put their hands to their mouths, and immediately leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, why don't you just put a cork in it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I tried that once.  The cork melted. THE SAME - AFTER DINNER Our heroes mull their situation over coffee.  Monica freshens their cups.  The Spleen squirts mustard in his coffee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's just not enough of us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But we know they're out there. Hundreds--maybe thousands of lonely, unknown superheroes, who desperately need a cause...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And a social life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, but how do we get to them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Obscene phone calls? They ignore that suggestion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you throw a barbecue? (moves off to another table) ON OUR HEROES, realizing that's it. INT.  INVISIBLE BOY'S ROOM - NIGHT - WITH MUSIC Invisible Boy sits at the desk in his room, writing immaculate little notes on small file cards.  (He's made a whole pile of them.) CLOSE ON THE NOTE - which reads "Got superpowers?  Want to fight evil?  Then JOIN US and let's PARTY HEARTY!  Beer!  Burgers!  Babes!" SERIES OF SHOTS - MUSIC CONTINUES as our heroes post these notes all over the city, in places where lonely superheroes night find them... The Raja posts a note on the door of a comic book store... The Shoveler posts a note on the bulletin board at a bowling alley... Mr. Furious tapes the note to the cracked glass of a vandalized phone booth... At an abandoned drive-in movie theater... Invisible Boy walks through the empty lot, taping a note to each of the old speaker posts... A White Castle hamburger joint... Inside the pay toilet Spleen is scratching something on the wall with a nail. He stops and admires his handiwork, and we see that he has engraved the entire message on the wall... END MUSIC. EXT.  SHOVELER'S BACKYARD - DAY A small, typical working class backyard.  A round, aluminum above ground pool.  A Weber grill with burgers on it. Unopened packages of hamburger rolls.  An old Vic Damon record plays on a boom box.  The Spleen floats around on a rubber raft in the pool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on in!  The water's great! In fact, the water is turning a yellowish green... The rest of our heroes sit around on cheap folding chairs.  No superheroes have shown up.  The Shoveler, at the grill, serves burgers to his kids, who stand in line waiting for them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great picnic, Dad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Big turnout.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are these guys real superheroes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They think so. The kids scoff...  A moment later they head back to the house with their burgers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But where's Captain Amazing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He wouldn't be caught dead here. They go into the house.  No one says anything.  The Shoveler just stares at the burgers on the grill.  Vic Damon sings. Furious chugs his beer; he's working himself into a really morose mood. ON THE SPLEEN, munching on a chlorine tablet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, these pool mints are delicious! Raja looks at his watch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe there was traffic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are we kidding?  No one's gonna show. We're living in a fantasy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, guys--we're fighting against evil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good or evil, what's the difference?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a big difference.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I used to believe that.  Now I'm not so sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roy, remember, it is all within your power. The only thing that's in your way... is you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh shut up. Suddenly, there is a knock at the gate.  Everyone immediately perks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're here! A moment later they open the gate and see... HALF A DOZEN BURLY GUYS wearing various superhero outfits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, man, is this the superhero wingding?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is it.  Come on in!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right!  Party!  (Etc.) At first glance these guys seem promising... but their outfits are decidedly improvised: weird goggles and sunglasses, shower curtain capes, baseball caps with beer cans on them.  Their leader holds a squeegee with a long handle... Furious is suspicious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am the Blue Raja, Master of Silverware.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am Squeegee Man, and these are my compadres, the Invincible Dudes! The Invincible Dudes spot the keg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa!  Brews!  Party!  (Etc.) They go immediately to the keg and start filling beer cups and guzzling them down.  The Raja tries to hand out some forms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you mind filling out these forms; names, addresses, description of superpowers, that sort of thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, dude.  No problem.  (Etc.) (but they just toss the forms away) ON FURIOUS, watching, starting to get pissed off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, man, like where are the babes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It said on the card there'd be babes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually we lied about the babes, but there's plenty of burgers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's false advertising!... We came all the way from South Champion, man!  We coulda gone plinking!... We coulda gone bunqee jumping!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No babes.  No peace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No babes--no peace!  No babes--no peace!  No babes--no peace!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's trash the place!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! Furious, fed up, confronts Squeegee Man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you're a superhero, what's your power?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am Squeegee Man. (holding it out threateningly) Touch my squeegee... and you die. The Invincible Dudes are cracking up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you fly?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wanna bet? EXT.  JUST OUTSIDE THE YARD - CONTINUOUS as Squeegee Man comes flying--and screaming--over the fence, landing none too gracefully in the front yard. A beat and his squeegee come flying out after him.  Another beat and the Invincible Dudes come running out the gate in a panic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get out of here!... That dude's crazy! They take off down the street, running right past a woman, carrying a bowling ball bag and dressed in a faded, threadbare old rayon superhero costume with a decidedly fifties flavor. She is THE BOWLER. EXT.  SHOVELER'S BACKYARD - A MOMENT LATER Our heroes sit around the patio, dejected, miserable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who died? They look up, see her standing there, and aren't quite sure what to make of her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm the Bowler.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Bowler?  I remember him from when I was a kid.  He was killed years ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm his daughter. Our heroes share a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, honey, being a superhero... it's a guy thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? She takes her bowling ball and spins it on the tip of her finger (like a Harlem Globetrotter).  For a long moment she just looks at them, smiling. ON THE OTHERS watching, almost mesmerized by the spinning ball... Suddenly, she gives an ear splitting battle cry and starts swinging the ball around her in wide ferocious arcs, like a cannibal with a war club--or a twirler on meth, going so fast she almost becomes a blur... Then, just as suddenly, she stops, aims and rolls her ball... It shoots straight through Invisible Boy's legs... ON A NEATLY PLACED COLLECTION OF PLASTER LAWN DWARVES - as the ball smashes into then, pulverizing them... It goes into a reverse spin, passes through Invisible Boy's legs again, and returns to the Bowler who is holding its bag open for it... The ball rolls in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good ball. ON OUR HEROES, left absolutely speechless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If it could zip up its own bag, then you'd be impressed, right? She turns and walks out.  Our heroes share an amazed look, then run after her... JUST OUTSIDE THE GATE - ON THE BOWLER walking away... as Furious catches up with her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey... Can I buy you a beer?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you'd never ask. She takes his arm and they all start to walk back into the Shoveler's backyard... but the CAMERA PANS ACROSS THE STREET to the dark place between two houses, where a MAN WEARING A STRANGE STEEL MASK with a frightening, impassively powerful expression stands in the deep shadows, watching them in motionless, predatory silence.  We do not know who he is, and we cannot tell if he is good or evil. BACK AT THE BARBECUE - A LITTLE LATER - CLOSE ON A FADED OLD SNAPSHOT of the original "The Bowler" holding a little girl in his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was more than just a superhero...  He was my father... The others, touched by this, have gathered around the Bowler, who is holding the old snapshot in her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And then one day, he didn't come home.  The police said it was an accident.  But cargo containers don't just fall on people.  He was murdered... After that I fell apart.  I dropped out of school, became a mud wrestler, married and divorced a jerk.  When my mother died I hit bottom... but then, when I was cleaning out her attic, I found my father's old bowling bag and costume, almost like he'd left them there for me... and I knew what I had to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So who killed him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Disco Boys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know something? Those guys are really starting TO PISS ME OFF!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But there's still only six of us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's two more than the Fantastic Four.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Half a Dirty Dozen!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Twice the Three Stooges!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And only one short of the Magnificent Seven.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you can't count Horst Buckholtz anyway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was cute though.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But they all had one thing we haven't got.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Girlfriends?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A name.  All the great superhero teams have got a fabulous name. They all think about it for a moment.  You can almost smell their brains overheating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about... the Savage Six?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Inscrutable Six?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Six Pistols?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Exterminators!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Obliterators!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Eradicators!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Emasculators!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait--I got it!... The Spleen Team. He gets beaned by a couple of empty soda cans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To hell with a name.  Let's get to work. MUSIC UP as Furious stands and starts out.  The others stand and follow him... as our heroes form up for their first HEROIC GROUP SHOT. EXT.  CITY STREET - NIGHT MUSIC CONTINUES as A LITTLE OLD LADY crosses the street, when suddenly she looks up and sees a pair of headlights coming on fast.  An immaculately maintained seventies limo is heading straight for her. INSIDE THE LIMO - CONTINUOUS Disco Boys sit in the front.  Casanova, Anabel, and Tony P sit in the back, dressed for a night on the town... There is a thud as the limo hits the old lady, and everyone in the car explodes into laughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Little old lady.  That's a hundred points! INSIDE/OUTSIDE THE LIMO - A FEW MINUTES LATER as the limo drives past a billboard with an ad for "MILK" with a milk mustached Captain Amazing looking at the camera...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He knows your every move. Tony P imitates a massive electrical convulsion, and the villains crack up. But as they pass the billboard, a pair of headlights illuminate in its shadows, and the Shoveler's Ford Esquire pulls out and follows. INSIDE THE ESQUIRE - CONTINUOUS The Shoveler is driving.  Mister Furious sits in the front seat next to him, and our other heroes are packed into the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's say hello. INSIDE/OUTSIDE THE TWO CARS - CONTINUOUS As the limo stops at a traffic light... and the Esquire pulls up alongside it.  For a moment good and evil stare each other down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not these guys again! The Disco Boys howl with laughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice car. The D Boys laugh.  Furious stares at Casanova, and Casanova stares right back at him, as cool as a snake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you do with Captain Amazing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, in the backseat, who are you supposed to be, the Bowler?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm his daughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His daughter?  Well guess what, sweetheart? I'm the one who squished your Daddy.  And he squished real good! The villains laugh, and Mister Furious EXPLODES INTO RAGE.  He swings open his car door, mashing it into the limo and leaving a big dent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! He starts punching the limo like it's a punching bag--putting big dents in it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Waste him! Tony and the boys all reach into their coats for their pistols--but as they yank them out, the Spleen sticks his head out of the station wagon, puts his face right up to the open window of the limo and lets loose with a TREMENDOUS BELCH... As the villains choke and gag in the noxious fumes, Mister Furious goes on a DEMOLITION RAMPAGE, working his way around the limo, punching big dents with his fists, breaking the windows with his head, flattening the tires by kicking them, knocking off the rear view mirror with the back of his hand... Then he leaps up on top of the limo... While inside the villains gasp for air as big dents are stomped into the roof above them... ANGLE THROUGH THE WINDSHEILD as Furious leaps down onto the hood, and gazes in at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shall I check your oil? He plunges his hand through the metal of the hood, pulls out the car's dip stick, and checks it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks fine. He tosses the dip stick away, then leaps off JUST AS Tony P gets off a shot, EXPLODING the windshield of the limo. Furious lands safely on the hood of the station wagon.  As the Shoveler throws the Esquire into gear, Furious shouts...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! And our heroes streak off into the night... Casanova and the others stagger out of the demolished limo, sucking in the clean air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That boy's got talent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I'm gonna nip it in the bud. ANGLE ON A DARKENED ALLEY - where the man in the strange steel mask can be seen... watching. EXT.  A BAR - LATER THAT NIGHT - ESTABLISHING A very typical, nondescript neighborhood place... INSIDE THE BAR - CONTINUOUS Our heroes stand at the bar, celebrating their first victory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To us!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever our name is. They toast and drink. THE SAME - LATER The Spleen is passed out at a table, snoring. Shoveler and Invisible Boy sit next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even his snores smell bad. Raja and Bowler sit at the bar, deep in it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But she's your mother.  You gotta tell her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't. ON SHOVELER AND INVISIBLE BOY INVISIBLE BOY Dad thinks all this superhero stuff is a stupid waste of time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But he plays golf, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. BACK ON RAJA AND BOWLER -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm her only son, and she always had such high hopes for me. Medicine.  Law.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you're a superhero.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The cape.  The turban.  She wouldn't understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know... My girlfriends all dumped me after I put on the mask.  They thought I'd lost it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But in fact... you'd found it. They clink their glasses and drink. BACK ON SHOVELER AND INVISIBLE BOY -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is your dream... and you can't ever give it up. The Spleen makes weird noises in his sleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wonder what he dreams about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't want to know. Mr. Furious sits alone in the corner, brooding, lost in his own angry thoughts.. OUTSIDE THE BAR - CONTINUOUS A black van drives slowly past the bar. INSIDE THE VAN - CONTINUOUS The van is packed with Disco Boys.  Tony P sits in the front seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There. HIS POV - He has spotted the Ford Esquire parked in the lot. BACK IN THE BAR - A LITTLE LATER ON THE BOWLER AND RAJA -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's late.  I'm headin' home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Junior, it's a school night. JUST OUTSIDE - A MONENT LATER As our heroes, carrying the Spleen, leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anybody up for a little White Castle? But suddenly the world is a whirling sass of chains and clubs as they are bushwhacked by the Disco Boys... EXT.  AN ALLEY - A LITTLE LATER - CLOSE ON FURIOUS as he comes to with a qroan and sees... the Bowler and Invisible Boy tied up and gagged, with the Raja, Shoveler, and the Spleen trussed up right next to them.  Furious looks up, sees Tony P standing over him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, cutie. Furious struggles, but he has been secured with some very heavy tire chains.  Tony P takes out a large caliber revolver, flips it open to make sure it's loaded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Six losers. Six bullets. Perfect... Got any last words, Angry Boy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Disco sucks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Disco sucks.  Very good.  You know what I'm gonna do, Angry Boy, since you're so colorful? I'm gonna save you for last. He turns and points the pistol right at Invisible Boy's head. Furious struggles against his chains--to no avail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sweet dreams, punk. Invisible Boy closes his eyes... Tony P cocks the pistol... But suddenly, there is the ring of steel--a broad blade sweeps through the air, and Tony P's pistol is sliced neatly in half.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (puts the sharp point of her comb handle under his chin)
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: A NEATLY PLACED COLLECTION OF PLASTER LAWN DWARVES
MAN WEARING A STRANGE STEEL MASK
SHOVELER AND INVISIBLE BOY INVISIBLE BOY
A LITTLE LATER ON THE BOWLER AND RAJA

direction.raw_text: ... The man is the strange steel mask is standing there, the drawn machete still in his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Buenos naches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get him! The Disco Boys rush the newcomer, but he slices through their baseball bats with his machete, and sends them reeling and crashing into each other with expert forearm blows, whacks with the flat of his blade, and head butts with his mask. Furious struggles to break free and join the fight, but the chains are too strong... and the stranger doesn't need any help. Tony P flicks open a big switchblade and lunges at the stranger, who sidesteps him like a matador and swings his machete at him.  Tony P turns, about to charge again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you like me to trim the sides?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Tony P feels the top of his head, and realizes that the blow from the machete has neatly sliced off the top his disco-do, leaving only stubble on the top of his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Tony and the Disco Boys run for it... Furious and the others study their masked savior, who stands before them, machete in hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're the Sphinx.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you are a fool. He raises his machete above Furious' head... and then slices clean through the chains. EXT.
direction.name: direction
